name: Recycled Beer Cap Dreadlock Beads
description:
These Handmade dreadlock beads are a world exclusive, made from bottle caps sourced in Australia. They are about pencil-diameter, but if you like, you can expand or contract them using pliers (Not your teeth!) and the rubber inside the cap provides excellent grip to your dreads.

Now also available: Mini Beer Cap beads (Smaller bead made from the edge crimp of the beer cap, see image 2)

Get free shipping on these when you buy any other product!

Choose a main colour (Styles may vary due to which beers we are drinking).

name: Dreadlock Shampoo Bar
description: Squeaky clean Dreadlock Soap! 135 gram. Natural. Hypo-allergenic. Anti-Dandruff. Great for sensitive skin. Hand-made pure vegetable soap, with no animal products or testing. Contains rosemary and tea tree for dandruff control, peppermint to sooth the scalp, and jojoba and vitamin E to nourish the skin. **Now also available, the same Dreadlock Shampoo Bar, with Goat's Milk! (Non-Vegan) The Dreadlock Shampoo Bar can also be used all over the face and body, so it's great for travelling. No added perfumes. Smells mildly herbal. To control dandruff, use twice per week. To use: Lather the bar in your hands, and massage foam into wet hair. Then rub the whole bar on to the scalp, and massage in. Wait about one minute, then rinse well. Do not condition. Ingredients: Pure vegetable soap, hemp seed oil, aloe vera, sodium bicarbonate, shea butter, calendula, vitamin E, neem oil, essential oils: lavender, tea tree, peppermint, lemongrass and rosemary. Arrives to your door within a week, and shipping gets cheaper the more items you buy from this site!

options.name: Dreadlocks Shampoo Bar with Goat;s Milk

name: Dreadlocks Scalp Serum (Anti itch)
description:
New Scalp serum by Monstrosity dreadlocks 20ml

A delicious and nourishing oil for your beloved locks!

Apply a few drops to your fingertip and rub into any areas of dry or itchy skin. Relieves itching, dryness and dandruff. Can also be used as a natural massage oil or skin moisturizer!

Contains grapeseed oil, lavender, peppermint, tea tree, jojoba, neem and lemongrass.

This product contains natural oils so is recommended for more mature dreads. This is not an alternative to washing your hair. If itching persists, wash more often with Monstrosity Shampoo Bar. Do not scratch your scalp, this increases itching.Â 

No preservatives. All natural. Made in Australia.

name: Synthetic Dreadlock extensions 24cm
description: These various synthetic dreadlocks are 24cm long. (See drop down menu for colours- Those with * are pictured) These are NOTHING like the twisted "dreadlock" extensions on dreadlocks.com.au, (also available for $3 each) which can untwist. They are approx 0.8-1 cm thick and have one rounded end, and one tapered (pointy) end. This means you can choose which end you attach to your hair! They can be trimmed or even cut in half to make two. These dreadlock extensions will not untwist, and are permanent. They look and feel a lot like human dreadlocks, and are slightly softer, stronger, and a little shinier. NOTE: They cannot be dyed- Their colour is permanent. Available in colours listed below. If you need them attached, Click here (this costs extra). Handmade in Australia from imported synthetic hair. Please allow up to 5 days for manufacture/postage. Priced per dreadlock. Image shows available colours. (Screen resolutions may vary) THESE OBVIOUSLY CANNOT BE RETURNED, ONCE IN CONTACT WITH YOUR HAIR. CHOOSE CAREFULLY!
